name: 9 Pound Hammer
description: 9 Pound Hammer is an 80% indica strain created by JinxProof Gentics that crosses Gooberry, Hells OG, and Jack the Ripper. These dense buds are coated in resin, offering sweet grape and lime flavors. True to its indica dominance, effects are heavy and long-lasting, useful for pain and stress relief. Best grown indoors, 9 Pound Hammer will deliver a heavy yield, flowering between 50 and 60 days.
descriptionPlain: 9 Pound Hammer is an 80% indica strain created by JinxProof Gentics that crosses Gooberry, Hells OG, and Jack the Ripper. These dense buds are coated in resin, offering sweet grape and lime flavors. True to its indica dominance, effects are heavy and long-lasting, useful for pain and stress relief. Best grown indoors, 9 Pound Hammer will deliver a heavy yield, flowering between 50 and 60 days.
aka: Nine lb. Hammer, Nine Pound Hammer, 9 Lb. Hammer, 9 lb Hammer, 9lb hammer, 9lb, 9 lb

highlightedReviews.text: TGA all Day Hands Down Love This Indica With A nice .22% cbd percent you know its sure gots to have a nice % of THC-V(pain reliever).Its got a Wonderful Relaxing Body High with a great euphoric rush throughout the body.Perfect strain to enjoy the rest of the night,Nice Berry,Fruity Flavor and Aroma. I Would Recommend For Pain,Sleep,and Stress..Most definitely another new favorite from Subcool420@TGA Genetics.5/5 Have A Dank Day.

I absolutely adore this strain. I live in Florida so I only receive oils. It‚Äôs amazing because I suffer from PTSD, Anxiety Disorder, and Insomnia and this strain relieves all my discomforts. No nightmares at night..... No feeling as if I‚Äôm not in control.... Just great to smoke all day for my anxiety, and great to smoke at night for my PTSD which is what triggers my insomnia. üíô

articles.title: What Are You Smoking? Episode 6: Sasha the Silenced Hippie Hits Hempfest
articles.author: Leafly Podcasts
articles.text:
What Are You Smoking?¬†features Leafly experts Jeremiah Wilhelm, Bailey Rahn, Will Hyde, and Brett Konen reviewing strains, test-firing products, offering up pro tips, and answering your toughest cannabis questions.
Leafly Podcast
What Are You Smoking?
Episode 006: Sasha the Silenced Hippie

In this episode:¬†Jeremiah hits some 9 Pound Hammer; Sasha, aka @SilencedHippie, pops by for Hempfest; and a condiment champion is crowned.

Good morning friends :) For anyone heading down to the Seattle Hempfest I‚Äôll be at the @Leafly booth from 2-5 for hugs and a huge sesh! pic.twitter.com/RE1q4u1Cyd
‚Äî ‚úå (@SilencedHippie) August 19, 2017
¬†

Strains & Products on This Week‚Äôs Show


Download Past Episodes

Meet Your Show Hosts

Jeremiah Wilhelm is a strain researcher and subject matter expert at Leafly. A former budtender, Jeremiah is the site‚Äôs reigning beard champion and self-proclaimed Office Garden Gnome.
¬†
Bailey Rahn is an editor at Leafly specializing in cannabis strains and health. When she‚Äôs not at Leafly, you‚Äôll likely find her smoking her way up a mountain or playing dress-up with her cats.
¬†
Will Hyde is a subject matter expert, strain specialist, and digital producer at Leafly.¬†He spends his free time traveling and exploring creative outlets as a DJ, digital artist, and film producer.
¬†
Brett Konen is an editor at Leafly specializing in lifestyle content. She‚Äôs fascinated by parallels between alcohol and cannabis, and is very bad at writing while high.
¬†

About Our Music:
Music for ‚ÄúWhat Are You Smoking‚Äù is provided by Lusine. ‚ÄúTicking Hands‚Äù is from his album¬†Sensorimotor.¬†‚ÄúTwo Dots‚Äù is from¬†A Certain Distance.¬†For more about Lusine, check out Ghostly.com.

growInfo.growNotes:
Mildew resistant
	Early topping will cause plants to grow bushier
	Clearing bottom branches ("lollipop") will encourage buds to grow stacked and dense
